text: Kogda prishel on k pit'yevym mestam Madyana, On tam nashel tolpu lyudey, Kotoryye (stada svoi) poili, A v storone ot nikh uvidel dvukh devits, Chto otognali v storonu (svoy skot). On (ikh) sprosil: "V chem vashe delo?" Oni otvetili (yemu): "My napoit' (nash skot) ne mozhem, Poka ne otoydut (vse pastukhi), A nash otets - glubokiy starets
